#summary LOST Room Node Main page.

= Introduction =

The Room node is the node in charge of a Room.
[http://lebomb-home-system-terminal.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/LOST_Nodes/Room/Images/All.jpg]

Zoom on the node:
[http://lebomb-home-system-terminal.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/LOST_Nodes/Room/Images/Zoom.jpg]

= Details =

As explained in the main page, the node is linked to the Server through an [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/I%C2%B2C I2C bus].

The node is fully stand alone as it has its own micro-controller.
The Board is organized around an [http://www.atmel.com/dyn/products/product_card.asp?part_id=2004 ATMega8L].

[LOST_Nodes_Room_Hw See hardware description]

With a software developed with [http://winavr.sourceforge.net WinAVR]
